sentences.en: a child with a hearing disability
He will now face a disciplinary hearing for having an affair.
sentences.cn: 他因有外遇而要面临纪律听证会的裁决。

sentences.en: Hearing can be affected by ear wax blocking the ear canal.
sentences.cn: 耳垢堵塞耳道可能会影响听力。

sentences.en: I am sick and tired of hearing all these people moaning.
sentences.cn: 我厌倦了听这些人大发牢骚。

sentences.en: I kept hearing the sound of applause in the background.
sentences.cn: 我不断听到隐约的鼓掌声。

sentences.en: I'm still reeling from the shock of hearing of it.
sentences.cn: 我听了此事后现在仍然震惊不已。

sentences.en: In the dark my sense of hearing becomes so acute.
sentences.cn: 黑暗中我的听觉变得异常灵敏。

sentences.en: Just crank up your hearing aid a peg or two.
sentences.cn: 把助听器调高一两个刻度就可以。

sentences.en: Some hearing-impaired children may work harder to overcome their handicap.
sentences.cn: 一些有听障的儿童可能需要花更大的力气来克服这一缺陷。

sentences.en: Ted might benefit from hearing his own voice recorded and played back.
sentences.cn: 听自己声音的录音回放对特德可能会有帮助。

sentences.en: The hearing-impaired say digital phones interfere with hearing aids.
sentences.cn: 听觉障碍者反映数字电话会对助听器造成干扰。

sentences.en: The public is certainly getting tired of hearing about it.
sentences.cn: 关于此事，公众当然已经听腻了。

sentences.en: The remand hearing is often over in three minutes.
sentences.cn: 取保候审听证会通常在3分钟内结束。

sentences.en: There are two main problems which afflict people with hearing impairments.
sentences.cn: 听力有障碍的人们主要受到两大问题的困扰。

sentences.en: Weber gave a fair hearing to anyone who held a different opinion.
sentences.cn: 韦伯让持不同意见的人都能有机会发表意见。

sentences.en: What are you hearing from people there?
sentences.cn: 你在那里都听到人们说了些什么？

phrases.tran_cn: 听而不闻；在漫不经心地听着别人讲话

trans.tran_cn: 听力，听觉，审问，听力所及的距离，听得见的范围，听证会，〈美〉意见听取会
trans.tran_en: the sense which you use to hear sounds

trans.tran_cn: 听到，听见( hear的现在分词)
